title: Vegetable Stir-fry
summary: A quick and healthy stir-fry with a colorful mix of seasonal vegetables and a savory sauce.
ingredients: 2 cups mixed vegetables (bell peppers, broccoli, carrots)
instructions: Heat olive oil in a pan over medium heat.
Add minced garlic and sauté for 1 minute.
Add mixed vegetables and stir-fry for 5-7 minutes until tender.
Pour in soy sauce, season with salt and pepper, and cook for another 2 minutes.

title: Classic Beef Burgers
summary: Juicy beef patties with melted cheddar, fresh lettuce, and a toasted bun. A timeless classic.
ingredients: Lettuce, tomato, and onion for toppings
instructions: Preheat grill or skillet over medium-high heat.
Form ground beef into 4 equal patties, season with salt and pepper.
Cook patties for 4-5 minutes on each side, adding cheese slices in the last minute to melt.
Toast buns on the grill or skillet.
Assemble burgers with lettuce, tomato, onion, and cooked patties.

title: Lemon Herb Roasted Chicken
summary: Tender and flavorful roasted chicken with fresh lemon, garlic, and herbs. Perfect for a family dinner.
instructions: In a roasting pan, place the chicken and season with salt and pepper.
Stuff the cavity with lemon halves, garlic, and fresh herbs.
Drizzle olive oil over the chicken and rub it in.
Roast for 1 hour 15 minutes, or until the internal temperature reaches 165°F (75°C).
Let rest for 10 minutes before carving.
